updates.description: Added Motorola flashing support including bootloader unlock, partition flashing, and improved device detection
Integrated SPD PAC file parser and extractor with full partition listing, CRC check, and file export functionality
Implemented Nokia NBO file extractor with structured unpacking, directory tree parsing, and secure extraction options
Added SPD diagnostic function for reading device information, NV data, IMEI repair, and advanced troubleshooting
Optimized user interface with progress bars, detailed logging, and error handling improvements
Enhanced fastboot command support with custom OEM operations, slot management, and secure flashing bypass options
Improved stability with multithreading support to prevent UI freezing during large file operations
Extended PAC firmware validation to include partition size checks, signature verification, and compatibility mode
